#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define in freopen("in.txt", "r", stdin);
#define esp 1e-10
#define lson l, m, rt<<1
#define rson m+1, r, rt<<1|1

using namespace std;
typedef long long LL;
typedef map<LL, int> MPS;
int powmod(LL a, LL b, LL c){
    LL res = 1;
    while(b){
        if(b&1) res = res*a%c;
        a = a*a%c;
        b >>= 1;
    }
    return res;
}
int main(){
    
    int T;
    for(int t = scanf("%d", &T); t <= T; t++){
       int n;
       cin >> n;
       cout << powmod(2, n-1, 1000) << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
